metadata.title: CVE-2024-9823 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: There exists a security vulnerability in Jetty's DosFilter which can beexploited by unauthorized users to cause remote denial-of-service (DoS)attack on the server using DosFilter. By repeatedly sending craftedrequests, attackers can trigger OutofMemory errors and exhaust the server'smemory finally.

criterions.comment: jetty9 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
